name: visus
description: Combines and exports the Visus JavaScript Viewer which upstream only provides as vanilla JS

scripts.build: cat src/visus/visus.js src/visus/colormaps.js src/visus/dvr.js src/visus/export.js > src/concat.js && patch -p0 -i patches/scoping_fix.patch && webpack

author: Markus Martin
